algorithm_technique: Mathematical analysis and greedy approach based on cost comparison
problem_summary_simple: Find the minimum cost to make all elements in an array equal using two types of operations.
problem_summary_technical: Analyze operations: cost1 (increment one element), cost2 (increment two elements). Optimal strategy depends on cost1 vs cost2 and array distribution.
key_insights: The target value must be at least the maximum element in the array.
Compare 2*cost1 with cost2 to determine the preferred operation.
The solution involves considering different target values and calculating the minimum cost to reach them.
